titleStmt.title: An act for the encouraging & increasing of shipping and navigation
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At head of caption: Anno XII. Caroli II. Regis.
Last word of first line of text: 'shipping'; first word of line below initial: 'strength'; last word of last full line of text of first page: 'or'.
Also includes: An act to prevent frauds and concealments of His Majesties customs and subsidies.

Issued separately with a general title page: 'Anno Regni Caroli II. Regis Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ, duodecimo. At the Parliament begun at VVestminster, the five and twentieth day of April, an. Dom. 1660.'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
